properties.description: Detects large amounts of DNS resolution failures.
properties.displayName: Corelight - C2 DGA Detected Via Repetitive Failures

properties.query:
corelight_http
| where isnotempty(proxied)
| where not(ipv4_is_private(id_orig_h))

properties.description: Detects SMB requests that originate internally and communicate with an external IP address.
properties.query:
union corelight_conn, corelight_conn_red
| where local_orig == true
| where local_resp == false
| where history hasprefix 'Sh' and service hasprefix 'smb'

properties.description: Detects compressed archives transferre over HTTP.
properties.displayName: Corelight - Multiple Compressed Files Transferred over HTTP
properties.query:
let threshold = 25;
corelight_http
| where method in~ ('POST', 'PUT')
| where isempty(referrer)
| where orig_mime_types has_any ('application/vnd.ms-cab-compressed', 'application/warc', 'application/x-7z-compressed', 'application/x-ace', 'application/x-arc', 'application/x-archive', 'application/x-arj', 'application/x-compress', 'application/x-cpio', 'application/x-dmg', 'application/x-eet', 'application/x-gzip', 'application/x-lha', 'application/x-lrzip', 'application/x-lz4', 'application/x-lzma', 'application/x-lzh', 'application/x-lzip', 'application/x-rar', 'application/x-rpm', 'application/x-stuffit', 'application/x-tar', 'application/x-xz', 'application/x-zoo', 'application/zip')
| summarize count() by uri, id_orig_h, bin(TimeGenerated, 15m)
| where count_ > threshold

properties.description: Detects sources sending multiple compressed files greater than 10MBs sent over HTTP in a short amount of time.
properties.displayName: Corelight - Multiple files sent over HTTP with abnormal requests
properties.query:
let threshold = 25;
let fl_size_threshold = 10000000;
corelight_http
| where method in~ ('POST', 'PUT')
| where isempty(referrer)
| where tolong(request_body_len) > fl_size_threshold
| summarize count() by uri, id_orig_h, bin(TimeGenerated, 15m)
| where count_ > threshold

properties.description: Identify scanning of services that may be available on the internal network.
properties.displayName: Corelight - Network Service Scanning Multiple IP Addresses
properties.query:
let threshold = 25;
union corelight_conn, corelight_conn_red
| where local_resp == true
| where local_orig == true
| where conn_state in~ ('S0', 'REJ')
| where history !contains 'D'
| summarize count() by id_orig_h, id_resp_p, bin(TimeGenerated, 1m)
| where count_ > threshold

properties.description: Detects post requests to unusual extensions.
properties.query:
corelight_http
| where method in~ ('POST', 'PUT')
| where toint(status_code) between (200 .. 299)
| where request_body_len != 0 or response_body_len != 0
| extend fe = extract(@'.*(\.\w+)$', 1, uri)
| where fe in~ ('.jpg', '.jpeg', '.gif', '.png', '.icon', '.ico', '.xml', '.swf', '.svg', '.ppt', '.pttx', '.doc', '.docx', '.rtf', '.pdf', '.tif', '.zip', '.mov')

properties.description: Detects rare post requests to a single webserver location.
properties.displayName: Corelight - Possible Webshell (Rare PUT or POST)
properties.query:
let threshold = 3;
corelight_http
| where method in~ ('POST', 'PUT')
| where toint(status_code) !between (400 .. 499)
| where request_body_len != 0 or response_body_len != 0
| extend fe = extract(@'.*(\.\w+)$', 1, uri)
| where fe in~ ('.aspx', '.asp', '.php', '.jsp', '.jspx', '.war', '.ashx', '.asmx', '.ascx', '.asx', '.cshtml', '.cfm', '.cfc', '.cfml', '.wss', '.do', '.action', '.pl', '.plx', '.pm', '.xs', '.t', '.pod', '.php-s', '.pht', '.phar', '.phps', '.php7', '.php5', '.php4', '.php3', '.phtml', '.py', '.rb', '.rhtml', '.cgi', '.dll', '.ayws', '.cgi', '.erb', '.rjs', '.hta', '.htc', '.cs', '.kt', '.lua', '.vbhtml')
| summarize count() by uri, id_orig_h
| where count_ < threshold

properties.description: Detects where an emails contain non ascii characters within the Subject.
properties.displayName: Corelight - SMTP Email containing NON Ascii Characters within the Subject
properties.query:
corelight_smtp
| where subject hasprefix  @'\=?utf-16'
| summarize recipients = dcount(_to)
| extend k = 1
| join (corelight_smtp
        | where subject hasprefix  @'\=?utf-16'
        | summarize by _to
        | extend k = 1) on k
| where recipients > 1

properties.description: Detects when an HTTP request was made to a domain that was using unicode/punycode.
properties.displayName: Corelight - Possible Typo Squatting or Punycode Phishing HTTP Request
properties.query:
corelight_http
| where method =~ 'GET'
| where isempty(referrer)
| where host has 'xn--'

connectorUiConfig.title: Corelight
connectorUiConfig.descriptionMarkdown: The [Corelight](https://corelight.com/) data connector enables incident responders and threat hunters who use Microsoft Sentinel to work faster and more effectively. The data connector enables ingestion of events from [Zeek](https://zeek.org/) and [Suricata](https://suricata-ids.org/) via Corelight Sensors into Microsoft Sentinel.

sampleQueries.query:
Corelight
	| summarize count() by id_orig_h
	| top 10 by count_

value:
Corelight
	| summarize LastLogReceived = max(TimeGenerated)
	| project IsConnected = LastLogReceived > ago(30m)

resourceProvider.permissionsDisplayText: read and write permissions are required.

read permissions to shared keys for the workspace are required. [See the documentation to learn more about workspace keys](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-monitor/platform/agent-windows#obtain-workspace-id-and-key).

instructionSteps.description: >**NOTE:** This data connector depends on a parser based on a Kusto Function to work as expected [**Corelight**](https://aka.ms/sentinel-Corelight-parser) which is deployed with the Microsoft Sentinel Solution.
Contact your TAM, SE, or info@corelight.com to get the files needed for the Microsoft Sentinel integration
instructionSteps.title: 1. Get the files

instructionSteps.description: Replay sample data to create the needed tables in your Log Analytics workspace

parameters.label: Send sample data (only needed once per Log Analytics workspace)

instructionSteps.title: 2. Replay sample data

instructionSteps.description: Install the custom exporter or the logstash container
instructionSteps.title: 3. Install custom exporter

instructionSteps.description: Using the following values, configure your Corelight Sensor to use the Microsoft Sentinel exporter. Alternatively, you can configure the logstash container with these values and configure your sensor to send JSON over TCP to that container on the appropriate port
instructionSteps.title: 4. Configure the Corelight Sensor to send logs to the Azure Log Analytics Agent

connectorUiConfig.additionalRequirementBanner: This data connector depends on a parser based on a Kusto Function to work as expected [**Corelight**](https://aka.ms/sentinel-Corelight-parser) which is deployed with the Microsoft Sentinel Solution.

| summarize count() by id_orig_h
| top 10 by count_
